import unittest
from typing import Text

from ai_flow.ai_graph.ai_graph import AISubGraph
from ai_flow.plugin_interface.job_plugin_interface import JobPluginFactory, \
    register_job_plugin_factory, get_registered_job_plugin_factory_list, JobHandle, JobRuntimeEnv, JobController
from ai_flow.translator.translator import JobGenerator
from ai_flow.workflow.job import Job
from ai_flow.workflow.status import Status



[docs]class MockJobPluginFactory1(JobPluginFactory, JobGenerator, JobController):


[docs]    def get_result(self, job_handle: JobHandle, blocking: bool = True):
        pass



[docs]    def get_job_status(self, job_handle: JobHandle) -> Status:
        pass



[docs]    def get_job_generator(self) -> JobGenerator:
        return self



[docs]    def get_job_controller(self) -> JobController:
        return self



[docs]    def job_type(self) -> Text:
        return "mock1"



[docs]    def generate(self, sub_graph: AISubGraph, resource_dir: Text = None) -> Job:
        pass

        pass

        pass

        pass




[docs]class MockJobPluginFactory2(JobPluginFactory, JobGenerator, JobController):


[docs]    def get_result(self, job_handle: JobHandle, blocking: bool = True):
        pass



[docs]    def get_job_status(self, job_handle: JobHandle) -> Status:
        pass

        return self

        return "mock2"

        pass

        pass

[docs]class TestJobPlugin(unittest.TestCase):


[docs]    def test_register_job_plugin(self):
        register_job_plugin_factory(MockJobPluginFactory1())
        register_job_plugin_factory(MockJobPluginFactory2())
        self.assertEqual(2, len(get_registered_job_plugin_factory_list()))
        self.assertTrue('mock1' in get_registered_job_plugin_factory_list())
        self.assertTrue('mock2' in get_registered_job_plugin_factory_list())



if __name__ == '__main__':
    unittest.main()
